Class LogicEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • LogicEngine

  • public class LogicEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses single line of input from the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogicEngine(java.lang.String dbLocation)
      Checks whether proposed database location exists and if a database does not already exist with the given name then creates a database

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeLogicEngine()
      Close the connection to the database
      java.lang.String parseInput(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String IP, int port)
      Given input execute all commands

    • Method Detail

      • parseInput

        public java.lang.String parseInput(java.lang.String input,
                          java.lang.String IP,
                          int port)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given input execute all commands
        Parameters:
        input - string of commands (as many as won't break the JVM)
        IP - IP of origin for the commands
        port - which port they were sent from on client's computer
        Returns:
        output response to parsing and executing commands
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection fails to close
